thread.title: Mr Gordon Cooper
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Mr Gordon Cooper

author: Mr Gordon Cooper
title: Mr Gordon Cooper
text: Sourced the ME G2 trousers and LD mountain were sensitively priced and had the correct size for me, even just prior to Christmas. Order placed on 21st December and they arrived on 23rd....absolutely awesome from LD, fantastic service and was kept frequently updated with emails. Thank you so much.
